item.title: Aspose.Email | Java Class Library to Process Outlook Formats
item.description: Java Email API Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Email for Java is a complete set of Email Processing APIs to create, read and manipulate emails from within your applications. It makes it easier to work with many Outlook email message formats such as MSG, EML, EMLX and MHT files without the need of installing Microsoft Outlook.
